Title: Galahad | Legend of Galahad, The

0x00=Dagger
0x01=Short Sword
0x02=Long Sword (with Dagger)
0x03=Long Sword (with Daggers)
0x04=Force Blade
0x05=Tempest Blade
0x06=Lion Blade
